descriptionlist.description:
BigSurExpanded is a theme with app icons based on the neumorphic style of
macOS 11.0 Big Sur, and the iconography of iOS. Use this with Big Sur from alt03b1
(It may be installed as a dependency)
Remove the Music and Files icons from "/Library/Themes/Big Sur.theme/IconBundles/" after installing.

screenshot.description: Home screen of my iPhone (6s Plus, iOS 14.2) with BSE (v0.1-b2) installed

changelog.change: Added Big Sur from alt03b1 and Filza as dependencies

Starting with this release, all stock apps that have a macOS icon
counterpart will use the macOS icon from
Big Sur by alt03b1 except for the following apps:
• Keynote
• Pages
• Numbers
• GarageBand
• iMovie
• Photo Booth
